scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ~/project/playground/part1 && yarn build --prod && cp -r build ~/project/playground/node/
scripts.build2:ui: rm -rf build && cd ~/desktop/fullstack-hy2020 && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ~/desktop/learn-node/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
